Meet the Founder

Discover Our Story

At Red Brick Winery, we believe that winemaking is storytelling. Our journey began over 20 years ago in the enchanting Brandywine Valley outside of Philadelphia, where history and refined elegance are intertwined. Inspired by the region’s rich heritage and vibrant lifestyle, Ahmed Chraga, our founder, fell in love with its culture and culinary traditions. Infusing Mediterranean flavors such as saffron, olive oil, fresh herbs, lamb, and seafood with locally sourced ingredients like the renowned mushrooms of Kennett Square, Ahmed’s multiple restaurants revolutionized the local dining scene. His fusion of Southern European and North African influences captivated diners with a unique and vibrant taste experience.

But Ahmed’s passion extended beyond cuisine. His journey into winemaking was ignited by a chance encounter with a glass of California wine, shared by his friend Kevin. At Red Brick Winery, Ahmed’s vision is to marry East Coast hospitality with West Coast innovation, crafting exceptional wines that beautifully complement his love for cuisine. This fusion of flavors and experiences reflects Ahmed’s dedication to creating unforgettable culinary and wine pairings. Today, Ahmed’s legacy continues to unfold in the hearts of Philadelphia’s culinary scene and California’s wine country. Join him at Red Brick Winery for an unforgettable journey of flavor, hospitality, and the perfect pairing of exceptional cuisine and extraordinary wines.

📰 Click here to read our most recent newsletter and signup for future issues!

Join Our Wine Club and Enjoy Discounts, Privileges and Exclusive Experiences

Welcome to the Red Brick Winery Wine Club – where every bottle tells a story, and every member becomes part of our family. Our wine club is more than just a subscription—it’s a lifestyle choice for those who appreciate the finer things. As a member, you not only receive exceptional wines delivered right to your doorstep but also receive exclusive perks and gain access to a world of exceptional experiences.

Frequently Asked Questions
(FAQs)

Red Brick Winery is a top Napa Valley destination, known for crafting premium wines that showcase the region’s grape varieties and terroir. Visitors can enjoy wine tastings, join exclusive wine clubs, and attend special events.

Yes, guests must be 21 years old or older to enjoy the wine at Red Brick Winery. This is a rule to ensure everyone’s safety and compliance with legal drinking age laws

You can easily create a custom wine label by filling out a form on our website. Share your name, email, the purpose of the wine, and any grape preferences, and we’ll guide you through the process.

We offer a range of wines, including reds, whites, and rosés, all crafted to reflect the quality of Napa Valley.

The Wine Club gives members discounts, exclusive wine selections delivered to their door, and invites to special tastings and events.

Yes, you can book a private tasting tailored to your preferences for a personalized wine experience.

Yes! We offer vineyard tours where you can learn about winemaking, explore the vineyards, and enjoy guided tastings.

For Napa Valley, call (707) 294-0616. For Glen Mills, call (610) 558-4700. You can also email us for assistance.

We occasionally host events with food pairings. Check our events page for upcoming food and wine pairing dinners.

We host a variety of events like winemaker dinners, private tastings, and vineyard tours, all designed to enhance your wine experience.

Napa Valley winery offering a tasting room, retail purchase, wine club memberships and wine events in Glen Mills, PA.
